summary: What's going on guys?  This is my second mod, and as per request, it improves the long bow.
descriptionHtml:
What's going on guys? This is my second mod, and as per request, it improves the long bow.

It increases the speed to 1.5 (from 1.0) and increases the damage to 24 (from 6).

The improved bow's name is Marksman's Bow. It can be bought in the Solitude Fletcher.

This mod should be compatible with all mods.

Possible glitch: Sometimes the Marksman's bow won't show the correct item necessary to temper it in the tempering menu. To fix it just leave the grindstone, then come back.

Also on the Steam Workshop at http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=252335342

I would really appreciate suggestions, critiques, etc. Also if it doesnâ€™t work with a mod, please let me know.

If you like this mod, please, leave a like. It helps get this mod noticed.

Thumbnail and screenshots taken and edited by me.
author: hmjki
